pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Gut Relief 180G
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Gut Relief is a great tasting formula that combines the power of prebiotics with key nutrients and plant extracts - slippery elm, marshmallow, aloe vera - to help:

- Reduces & relieve bloating

- Soothe gut irritation

- Support gastrointestinal health & immune function



It works in 3 ways by:

1.     Soothing the intestinal lining

2.     Protecting the gut lining

3.     And stimulating the growth of good bacterial in the colon- thanks to the action of prebiotics

 

Nutra-Life Gut Relief comes in a great orange and mango flavoured powder format.

Suitable For: Suitable for vegetarians.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian

Size: 180g powder

Flavour: Orange & mango

KEY FEATURES

• Reduces & relieves bloating
• Soothe gut irriations
• Supports gastrointestinal health & immune function

Warnings

Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist see your health care professional.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Formulated without: Gluten, wheat, animal products, dairyproducts, egg, artificial colours, artificial flavours or artificial sweeteners.

Ingredients

Each level scoop of 6g provides:
Glutamine 2g
Ulmus rubra (Slippery elm) stem bark powder 750mg,
Pectin (Prebiotic) 600mg,
Quercetin 200mg,
Acacia (Prebiotic) 1.2g,
Meriva® Curcuma longa phospholipid complex 50mg - Containing Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) rhizome dry extract 10mg
Equiv. Curcuma Longa rhizome fresh 1.65g Standardised to contain Curcuminoids 10mg,
Aloe vera leaf inner juice powder 50mg
Equiv. Aloe vera leaf inner juice dry 10g,
Cynara scolymus (Globe artichoke) leaf dry extract 100mg
Equiv Cynara scolymus leaf dry 5g,
Althaea officinalis (Marshmallow) root dry extract 533.33mg
Equiv. Althaea officinalis root dry 1.6g,
Zinc gluconate Equiv. Zinc 7.5mg.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Take 1 level scoop (6g) once daily before a meal, dissolve in 150ml of chilled water or as recommended by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool dry place below 30°C.
